The Charms of Terraglacia

John Milk had only ever known his home to be a land of ice and order. The Eldersâ€™ Council oversaw all aspects of life, his sister Lily whiled away her time carving protective charms and John himself spent his days working on the farmland. However, everything changes when he finds a mysterious relic in the ice. One discovery leads to another and, before the ice has a chance to thaw, John finds himself questioning everything that he knows.
